info.title: The Lone Pixel
info.author: Aslai
info.details:
Controls:
    Note: use the Wiimote on its side.
    Movement: D-Pad
    Jump: 2
    Restart Level: -
    Next Level: +
    Quit: Home


This was originally programmed as an entry 
for Ludum Dare on the PC, but I got a Wii for 
Christmas and I thought I'd try my hand at 
Homebrew. As my first big project, I ported this.
Enjoy!
